website_summaries.verdict: A great product for those who want something to prime their hair before styling curls.
pros: This fantastic moisturizing and curl-defining primer cream is formulated to seal in your hair's moisture
Calms down thick and frizzy hair
Coats the hair cuticle to reduce frizz and locks out humidity
Doesn't leave a wet or sticky look
cons: Isn't great for very thin hair due to the thickness of the cream

customer_reviews.title: Can be used on either damp or dry hair!  A little dab works fine!
customer_reviews.text: This cream is a lifesaver for my wavy hair in between shampoos. I use a tiny amount after I brush my hair in the morning. It instantly calms frizz and defines my waves and curls. Then I use a wide toothed comb and fluff my waves with my fingers. I’m 62 years old, Caucasian. Get a lot of compliments on my hair!
customer_reviews.author: ADK lady

customer_reviews.title: Best Curly Hair Product EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly hair, and Curvaceous was recommended by my hair dresser. It is not sticky or viscous, and really does define and enhance curls whether blowing out with a diffuser or drying naturally. My daughter, who also has natural curls, stole my other one. Since I have Amazon Prime, I decided to order online. Glad I found it! Price was cheaper than in the salon!
customer_reviews.author: Meg Hill

customer_reviews.title: I love this hair product
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair product, I have a natural wave and it helps to bring it out nicely on the days when i just want to wash and air dry. It doent leave that wet look or sticky feel like other products
customer_reviews.author: Linda Nokes

customer_reviews.title: Did the opposite of what's intended
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cream after reading so many great reviews, but I must have weird hair because this cream left my naturally wavy hair flat and straight, with no body. I only used a tiny amount, too. I love the way it smells, but it just made my hair so limp and lifeless!
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Curl Refiner Cream
customer_reviews.text: This is this first product that I have actually used on my hair. I have naturally curly hair and have usually just let it air dry and do its own thing. My husband recently bought me a difusser with a blow dryer and my stylist told me she thought the Redken Curvaceous line would work well for my hair. It smells great and you don't need much in your hair! It leaves my hair feeling soft! I don't notice any 'crunchy' feel to my hair like most products I used to wear when I was a teen.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon N Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: I love the results
customer_reviews.text: After using mousse for much of my life, I decided to give this product a try based on other reviews. I love the results! I get the same scrunched curl look without the crunch of mousse. I'm sold! :)
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Overwhelming smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell is overpowering. It will Linger on your hair until the next washing and it's not the most pleasant smell. I used it once and I could smell it all over on my bedding my clothes everything. Other than that it's just a regular curl cream it wasn't particularly great. The smell makes it a complete zero
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Works nicely, though doesn’t hold all day
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than a competing product I bought at CVS. But it doesn’t hold all day for me. Admittedly, my long hair is fairly straight, with mild curls at the nape of my neck. Using this with a hairdryer and scrunching my hair as I dry it upside down (leaving it slightly damp), it provides a lot of body and some nice allover wave with a slight “crunch” to it (like old school gel used to leave, but with a softness to it - hard to explain, but its meant to be positive). I just wish it lasted all day. However, as it wears off, I’m still happy with the look.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice moisturizer for hair
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my hairdresser after I got my first permanent in 20 years. It’s great as a moisturizer because apparently the main concern with perms is damage to the hair. The feel is great, not greasy, I even rub the rest into my hands as a moisturizer after I apply. It’s also great for curl definition, though I find I still need a little hairspray to keep the look all day. My perm lasted 6 months and my hair was in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah C.

customer_reviews.title: This gave wonderful control to the curls while remaining soft to touch
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised by this product. I have a ton of curls that don't want to follow directions. This gave wonderful control to the curls while remaining soft to touch.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Zero Definition
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me, but unfortunately, I am so disappointed. It leaves my hair limp with zero volume. I was hoping for a more defined curl, but leaves it wavy and a lil all over the place. It's super soft though. I've had to use all of my other products just to end up in a ponytail. The smell is super strong and even overpowers my hair spray.
customer_reviews.author: JenR

customer_reviews.title: Good mixed race hair result outside high humidity areas
customer_reviews.text: Works well in my mixed white/Afro hair. Will last a while with the small amount needed to define my curls. Doesn’t keep frizz down in the south, but works well in 60% humidity or less.
customer_reviews.author: Hema Ward

customer_reviews.title: leaves hair feeling brittle
customer_reviews.text: This was a big disappointment. I've had $5 gels from Walmart that made my hair feel much more softer and defined my curls without it feeling crunchy. This product did everything I did not want. It made my hair crunchy, brittle and DID NOT define my curls. Went into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Evangeline M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! My own issue is, that since I have very fine hair, it seems to cause more damage to my ends than other products do. But overall, this stuff is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: jennijaks

customer_reviews.title: Great curl, no frizz or grease.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It doesn’t make my hair stiff or crunchy, just helps the curls stay in place without turning into a frizzy mess. You don’t need to use too much, so this size will last me about a year!
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Defines curls; bad smell/can make hair greasy
customer_reviews.text: I like it overall, it defines curls. Not a fan of the smell. Easy to get your hair too greasy if you use too much or don’t comb it into your roots enough
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Fredrickson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: 1st time using, having used other curl Redken products. Made my curls very nice, kept shape, think I like better than the swirl product in pump bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Botticelli

customer_reviews.title: not real redkin
customer_reviews.text: I dont believe this is real redkin you would buy at the salon. I compared it to the salon product and the salon product worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cantwell

customer_reviews.title: The best product for my curls
customer_reviews.text: I have natural curly hair. This product is by far the best for my curls. It doesn’t make my hair feel great or crunchy. I get loads of compliments when I use this stuff. It came as advertised, on time and sealed well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, it works wonders for my curls. I was however, very disappointed with the fact that when I went to use it right after taking it out of the package, the top corner is punctured, causing the product to seep out as I try to squeeze it out into my hand. So there is product coming out of both ends. Other than that, I have no disappointment in the actual product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Cat McLane

customer_reviews.title: With the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Keeps curls light ...not sticky and helps keep my hair from getting frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great curl cream
customer_reviews.text: I have wavy hair, this curl refiner cream is great for keeping the frizz away. Good hold withybeing crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Love this curl cream. Keeps my naturally curly hair under control and smells great
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Not good for just wavy hair
customer_reviews.text: I don't have curly hair but wavy hair and I didn't like how it did my hair at all with a diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: MRose

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream for my naturally curly hair. I was able to go from 2-3 products to 1. I use on wet hair out of the shower and a little to refresh between washes.
customer_reviews.author: Jane H. Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: makes my curls happy
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair product. im very picky since some can be more harmful to my hair then helping my hair. i would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela

customer_reviews.title: Redken - Always an Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: After having a perm and needing to keep the curls soft and pretty, I bought the Redken Curvaceous Curl Refiner and got amazing results. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J. Shadle

customer_reviews.title: Great product for curly hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great at taming my extremely curly hair. It helps keep my hair from fizzing in the humid weather.
customer_reviews.author: James Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the old one - smells too strong, doesn't work as well
customer_reviews.text: The smell is too strong and like an irritating perfume rather than the beautiful smell the older/previous product used to have. It also seems to not be working as well as the older product I have used! I'm disappointed with this product and wish they could bring the old one back!
customer_reviews.author: M+S

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: I think I have found the perfect product for my hair. And it is affordable. I have natural curly hair and I love how my curls come out.
customer_reviews.author: JJS

customer_reviews.title: Must use for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I’m a curly girl. This, with the matching gel are a magic combination.
customer_reviews.author: LiliH

customer_reviews.title: just yes!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this product! my mom is a cosmetologist and has had me using this line of products for my curls for years. always gives me gorgeous curls.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not for a greasy scalp
customer_reviews.text: I have finer hair so it’s hard to find a good product. I feel like this would work great in thicker hair. It just doesn’t quite work for my hair type
customer_reviews.author: kate summers

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit thick and doesn't hold my curls as well as my normal product. I don't really like the texture either.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Li

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is one of the few hair products made for curly hair that actually help define my curls without frizz.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Camano

customer_reviews.title: perfect quality
customer_reviews.text: Keeps hair in control. Hair stays perfect, even going outside.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hallworth

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT WAS USED
customer_reviews.text: Never have I ever received any product open like I did today. I was so disappointed to receive my product used and with NO SEAL!
customer_reviews.author: Nallely González

customer_reviews.title: Great product for curls!
customer_reviews.text: Helps my curls be soft and not frizzy. Easy to use, lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says
customer_reviews.text: I have semi curls in some spots and no curls in others. this evens it out and gives my hair body.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great gel/cream styling aid
customer_reviews.text: This medium weight gel works well with my medium curly hair
customer_reviews.author: Carla A.

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: Works ok but the smell is too perfume-y for me...
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Its cheaper on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and its a lot cheaper on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Filer

customer_reviews.title: ... product came just as promised and I am very happy with this company
customer_reviews.text: This product came just as promised and I am very happy with this company!
customer_reviews.author: Life has been good

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Quite a thick cream to be honest i was not that impressed The Kevin Murphy product is much better if its the curls that your looking for that is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It left my curls limp and dry
customer_reviews.text: My hair is type 3 a, European style. This product left my hair limp and dry. I hate it. I will not use it again because it did nothing for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Torres

customer_reviews.title: and this one is my favorite. After washing my hair
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several Redken Curvaceous products, and this one is my favorite. After washing my hair, I run this cream through my hair and sleep on my hair wet. I wake up with curly hair. (My hair is naturally wavy.)
customer_reviews.author: K. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I've also used the Redkin Curvaceous CCC spray and I think I like this a bit better. Though the CCC spray can be used on dry hair, so I like that. This can only be used on damp hair, so if I'm not washing my hair that day I have to at least get it damp before using this. But it works great on my curls. It holds my curls for hours, and doesn't make my hair feel stiff or heavy.
customer_reviews.author: The wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Best Curl Product I've Used
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best thing I've ever used on my hair post-shower! It holds my curls but doesn't make them stiff like gel. It also doesn't leave that "lotion" feeling on my hands after touching my dry hair like some hair cremes I've used. I love this product and I've already bought more!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible
customer_reviews.text: I hated all of the other curvaceous products, meaning I threw away practically full bottles, except this one. It wasn’t terrible. It didn’t give my fine wavy hair the wave I wanted, but it wasn’t frizzy like it is without using. I’ve found other products that work better, but this wasn’t terrible. I would use it again if it were my only choice.
customer_reviews.author: Mom23dogs

customer_reviews.title: Great scent & Curls Galore!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite curly hair product by far! I wash my hair at night, put in the cream and then pull it up in a ponytail to dry while I sleep. Curls galore in the morning which is just what I want. Cream has a nice scent and goes on very easy - great for longer, curly hair. Hoping it will work well to combat frizz during the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work on Fine Hair
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product, but unfortunately it did not love my fine curly/wavy hair. I decided to risk using it alone and not applying a leave-in conditioner first and it dried out my hair and all of the curl fell out. Unfortunately, I will have to pass on this product. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Rock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hair product for girls who like their waves and want to emphasize them.
customer_reviews.author: Faux Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful and strong!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but absolutely do not like the smell. Too strong and heavy. No one around me likes the smell of it. They tell me it smells like an old bad smelling perfume. Wish it came in another scent or scent free
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Maltese

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Great for volume and bouncing that curl back. Smells clean not a clash with perfume. And a little dab is perfect with my length. I will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stec

customer_reviews.title: Curl definition
customer_reviews.text: Love this product I felt like I got the curl I’ve always wanted with this product. I used it with the curvaceous spray curl stuff . Best curl ever for days
customer_reviews.author: sasha

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly packaged and great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for curly hair, you only need a little bit and it works very well. I got this right away and will purchase again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Steciak

customer_reviews.title: Everyday hair product
customer_reviews.text: This is a product I use in my hair everyday. I have wavy, curly hair. It’s not sticky or tacky feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Java Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Gives me great soft curls. I recommend using it with an anti-frizz serum or low to medium hold curl spray.
customer_reviews.author: Kayce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Just wish it wasn't so expensive. Use sparsely
customer_reviews.author: Kimmyg

customer_reviews.title: Altamente recomendable/ Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Excelente producto para pelo rizo. Excellent product for curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: onlineshopping

customer_reviews.title: Very best for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the very best product that I have ever found for curly and wavy hair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I had ever curly hair before the gray came in, but it is worse. This product helps me tame my curls and it softens the texture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Consistency and it makes my hair smooth and minimizes frizziness. Scent is light and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Great curl defines.
customer_reviews.text: Only have to use a little and it works great. I just wish it wasn’t so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best curly hair product I’ve used in a long time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gives soft curls every time!
customer_reviews.text: so glad to be able to buy this product again- I've missed having it.
customer_reviews.author: FB

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to try to find something to replace the Curl Refiner that Redkin got rid of about two years ago (broke my heart). I've tried soooo many products. This one does the trick, and it is something I will continue to buy. I have mid-back length curly hair that is dry and very frizzy. I have a hard time finding products that help keep it under control. I use a palmful of this while my hair is wet, and comb it through evenly. I then use a palmful of mousse to scrunch the ends and add volume. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jalynn Baker

product_meta.title: Redken Curvaceous Curl Refiner Cream | For Curly Hair | Curl Defining Primer That Helps Control Frizz | With Moringa Oil | 8.5 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Enliven and enrich your waves and curls with Curvaceous Curl Refiner Curl Cream. This moisturizing curl refining and defining curl cream is formulated with Redken's exclusive Curl Memory Complex of sugar crystals, moringa oil and UV filter as key ingredients to define and moisturize curls. This curl product is a leave-in cream added before styling to provide moisture, discipline and frizz control for your curls.

BRAND STORY
Redken 5th Avenue NYC is a professional haircare and haircolor company dedicated to providing science backed products, inspiring education and unparalleled creativity for consumers and stylists alike.
